profiles:
Summary I have an undergraduate degree in Business administration “Major Marketing" from Cairo University, and have spent the last six years in e-marketing with a strong emphasis on search engine marketing and media planning. My responsibilities include setting goals for campaigns, monitoring and reporting the results. Additionally, I take the lead role in managing and maintaining my client’s web site, social media accounts and analytics. 
 
In the capacity of supporting the Marketing team of my clients, I recommend and implement the usage of tools designed to improve the campaign’s results. I also take the lead in training employees on using digital tools and Google advertising program. 
 
I work closely with social media and designers teams in order to develop and implement digital marketing strategies that support the client’s marketing goals while at the same time respecting the company’s bottom line. I liaise with IT and SEM specialists, develop and manage SEM campaigns in consultation with these professionals, and report on their progress. It is also my job to conduct market researches, watch trends, and ensure the company’s e-marketing plan takes advantage of the latest developments in technology and social networking. Experience Senior Digital Media Manager MEC May 2015  – Present (4 months) Regional Digital Media Manager MediaSci ME December 2013  –  April 2015  (1 year 5 months) - Lead and champion digital engagement across the organization.  
- Manage the Digital Media team ensuring effective strategy, delivery and evaluation of all digital activities. This includes websites, online marketing and engagement, social networks, e-commerce, mobile, search engine optimization, user experience, email marketing, analytics and digital governance. 
- Working with the Head of Communications in creating and then delivering a client wide strategic plan for digital media while ensuring that the client's company keeps up with the new practices and technological developments. Digital Media Manager Digital Republic September 2011  –  December 2013  (2 years 4 months) - Planning of assigned accounts 
- Buying in case of any ad hoc or special buys in assigned accounts outside annual deals or agenc deals. 
- Supervising the reporting of assigned accounts 
* Work in hand with offline counterparts to ensure digital recommendation is in line with advertising and marketing objectives. 
* Develop media plans and present it to the client. 
* Thorough command of creating plans and managing clients’ budgets. 
* Assure all communication for media buys (POs, authorizations) are issued and received prior to purchasing of any media. 
- Develop and build strong working relationships with internal teams including: 
* Account handlers to ensure correct vision and alignment on projects. 
* Creative team to ensure clear communication regarding the strategy and vision of the media plan. 
* Social media team in order to generate synergies from aligning the social media with the paid media strategies. 
- Staying up to date on media development and trends; synthesizing information into ideas and takes initiative on providing Client updates.  
- Lead and mentor a team; contribute to and provide performance evaluation on digital planning specialists. Senior Digital Media Planner & Google adwords supervisor Digital Republic December 2010  –  September 2011  (10 months) - Develop and manage media plans and market flowcharts. 
* Monitor new trends in digital media. 
* Help clients in incorporating the internet and other digital media into their advertising campaigns. 
* Ensure that client goals, budget, and target audience are met. 
* Track effectiveness of advertising campaigns, analyze data and provide viable strategies. 
* Creative approach in finding solutions that meet advertiser’s objectives. 
* Utilize research and reporting tools to gather competitive insights and supporting the sales team (Google Analytics, Nielsen, etc.). 
* Review client’s insertion orders and confirm feasibility for delivery and execution with key partners. 
* Work in tandem with editorial, web development, design, legal, and other departments to develop programs and ensure campaign feasibility. Digital Media Planning Specialist & Google Adwords Supervisor Digital Republic April 2010  –  December 2010  (9 months) Identify the best mix of media channels to deliver an advertising message to client's target audience. Using research data, they consider what is going to be most effective within the budget allocated and give the client's product or service the maximum exposure. Provide insights across the entire media spectrum, including mobile communications and online media. 
 
-Typical duties include: 
* Meeting clients to understand their advertising strategy and building up a picture about their target audience. 
* Analyzing and researching the target audience's character, purchasing and media habits. 
* Maintaining contacts with media owners, ensuring statistics, circulation and viewing figures are up to date. 
* Advising the creative team and clients about the most effective media combination. 
* Considering appropriate timings of media activities, based upon usage patterns and seasonal factors. 
* Presenting media proposals, including timings and cost breakdowns, helping clients in reaching a final decision about their future advertising strategy. 
* Obtaining the best advertising rates that fit the agreed media strategy. 
* Presenting alternative options to the media planner and client. 
* Adjusting media schedules in response to the latest audience figures. 
* Managing budgets and maintaining advertising spend records. 
* Monitoring and updating clients on the effectiveness of campaign implementation on Google platform. 
* Managing advertising platforms to ensure campaign delivery, performance and advertiser’s goals are being fulfilled as scheduled. 
* Requesting, receiving, testing, posting, and confirming all materials from outside vendors and internal departments (as required). SEM Specialist Freelancer November 2009  –  April 2010  (6 months) Search Marketing professionals develop marketing campaigns around keywords/terms that relate to our client’s product/service in an effort to convert a browser to a buyer. By thoroughly understanding their client’s initiatives and goals, they can produce and deliver highly effective campaigns that have a direct and measurable effect on bottom line sales figures. Search Marketing has become a company’s best salesperson by reaching the consumer at an optimal time, when they are looking to purchase or subscribe. SEM Account Manager Denver PPC January 2009  –  November 2009  (11 months) A SEM account manager has ultimate responsibility for a number of accounts with an average monthly budget of $225,000, manages the work of several types of accounts like: 
1- Online Store (Ex. Wu Long Tea, Dr Chair, Tru Tech Tools, and Baby Beau and Belle). 
2- Forums (Ex. Power Marketing and fast roofing). 
3- Services (Ex. Scottish stained Glass, Waghchal and shar, Mc Fenlands, and elitch polling) 
4- Tourism (Ex. Tree Top Asia). 
5- Medical (Ex. Ithaca). 
6- IQPC Conferences. 
 
The work usually involved: 
* Managing a portfolio of accounts. 
* Dealing with all aspects of a campaign. 
* Using an existing network of industry contacts to generate revenue. 
* Leading and training other members of the account team. 
* Managing the work of account executives. 
* Leading project management activity. 
* Ensuring necessary actions are undertaken by the account team. 
* Achieving client targets. 
* Attending client meetings. 
* Completing administrative work, as required. Summary Senior marketer with proven record in managing complex digital marketing projects with both branding and direct response objectives. Experience across various industries (education, consumer goods, luxury goods, banking). Broad business and academic background in marketing and strategic management supported with strong analytical skills. 
 
Strong communication and collaboration skills proven in day-to-day contacts with clients, suppliers as well as project team members.  
 
Experience across multiple geographies - managed global projects for multinational companies.  
 
Google AdWords Certified: Search and Display; Experience in managing campaigns on Baidu (China) and Yandex (Russia) 
 
MECLABS Certification in Online Testing

Specialties: digital strategy and roadmap definition, paid media (display advertising, social media, SEM (Google, Baidu, Yandex); online testing, conversions optimizations Experience Senior Digital Media Manager Digital Luxury Group (DLG) (former IC-Agency) January 2011  – Present (4 years 8 months) Geneva Area, Switzerland Senior Digital Media Manger within Client Services Department of Digital Luxury Group.  
 
Management of international, cross-channel projects with special focus on paid media: 
 
•	Account management for key clients: 
-	Digital strategy and roadmap definition 
-	Conception of yearly planning; management of development, coordination and execution across various channels (SEO, social media, paid search, web analytics, display/video advertising),  
-	Supervision of the implementation with other team members.  
 
•	Management of branding advertising campaigns: 
-	Media planning and buying for international display advertising campaign 
- Experience in managing international, multilingual paid search campaigns across several search engines (Google, Yandex, Baidu) 
 
•	Management of performance based advertising campaigns: 
-	Planning, implementation and optimization of global paid search campaign with lead generations objectives (volume of leads and cost per lead) 
-	Management of cross-channel media activation (social media, paid search, display/video) for new product launch 
- Landing page optimization, A/B testing, remarketing  
 
•	Projects’ coordination with the stakeholders involved on client side (marketing, communication, IT department) or external partners (web agency, publishers etc.) 
 
•	Responsible for media budget recommendations for agency clients: annual media budget, market and channel allocations, annual media strategies. 
 E-Marketing Project Manager IC-Agency January 2009  –  December 2010  (2 years) Geneva Area, Switzerland Project manager within Client Services department.  
 
Management of digital projects for the agency clients; responsible for definition of the projects’ scope and goals, profitability, planning, deliverables and allocation of resources 
 
•	Responsible for digital projects in the areas of:  
-	Paid search advertising 
-	Display advertising  
-	Search engine optimization  
-	Brand protection/traffic hijacking on the Internet 
-	Online audience affinity studies 
 
•	In charge of coordination and centralized reporting of international online display advertising campaigns in 10 European markets for a high-end brand; media plans evaluation followed with recommendations. 
 
•	Clients’ support and consulting in defining online marketing strategy  
 
•	At internal level, in charge of media budget management, process optimization to improve the profitability of paid search/display advertising projects as well as capability building and training in the area of paid search/display advertising 
 Account Executive IC-Agency January 2007  –  December 2008  (2 years) Marketing and analytical support and consulting on IC-Agency accounts. Involved in display advertising campaigns (buying, planning and management), paid search campaigns, search engine optimization projects or e-metric analyses. Also, involved in new program recommendations and profitability analyses and forecasting in order to maximize the Company advertising revenues.
